name: Separated Survival
description:
Control two characters at once. Join together and escape the aliens!

Controls:

Left Character:

Movement: [W] [A] [S] [D]

Lock Direction: [Left Shift]

Right Character:

Movement: [P] [L] [ ; ] [ ' ]

Lock Direction: [Right Shift]

Important note: Different models of keyboards have a different amounts of keys that can be pressed down at once. Keep that in mind while playing!
